story:
Thank You for your interest in Our Ancestors' Recipes! This campaign has now ended. Please follow our progress in creating this fabulous recipe book at:

http://www.ourancestorsrecipes.com.

 

The Gist

The goal of Our Ancestors’ Recipes project is to create a recipe book that will contain the best recipes from our ancestors, along with their stories.  Through this project I will connect with people who have fabulous recipes that have been handed down generation to generation.  I plan to make each recipe personally and choose the best of the best along with the stories that may accompany the recipes.  I will then compile these recipes and stories into a recipe book.

My grandmother (pictured to the left) taught me to cook when I was young.  She died 7 years ago at the age of 96.  Her mother (pictured to the right) brought recipes from Poland when she immigrated to America at age 16.  She died at age 74, two months after I was born.  When I cook my grandmother and great-grandmother’s recipes, I am brought back to some of the best times of my life:  cooking with my family and celebrating the ordinary and the extraordinary events of our lives.

But far deeper than my memories are the historical significance of where these recipe originated.  The recipes of my ancestors are steeped in the immigration of the early 1900s, WWI, the great depression, WWII, the movement of the 60s and more.

Those are MY ancestors.  But what about your family, your friends, your neighbors?  I would like to create a recipe book, compiled of recipes that have been handed down generation after generation, steeped in delicious ingredients, rich history and great love, from all over the country, perhaps from countries around the globe.

Our Ancestors’ Recipes project will take me into places where our seniors congregate such as places of worship, senior citizen centers and reunions, to talk with them and collect their stories and their recipes.  My family has recipes that go back 100 years.  But I know that there are recipes in our communities that go back even further. 

On each page of the Our Ancestors’ Recipes book there will be the person’s recipe and their story (or ancestor’s story) and if possible their picture (or their ancestor’s picture).  This will provide a glimpse of the history they lived through and the significance of that recipe for their family. 

We need food to survive, and we use food to celebrate and to console.  History has shaped our recipes; our recipes have shaped our family history and our memories. Pierogies take me back to a simpler time, where many afternoons were spent cooking with my grandmother.  Root beer floats, complete with whip cream and a cherry, were shared with my grandparents on warm summer nights. We all have memories surrounding great food and I want to preserve these recipes, our recipes, and our stories surrounding them.

What We Need & What You Get

I want to have the freedom to fully dedicate the next three months to researching and writing this book.  I want to be free of distractions so I can talk with people and gather their stories and recipes.  The funds for this project will go towards research, collecting and organizing the recipes and stories, making each recipe, writing and editing the book, and graphic design. 

If you are able to contribute to my project, there are several perks available.  Every person who contributes will be mentioned on the OurAncestorsRecipes.com website.  Other perks include a free copy of the .pdf version of the book before the book goes live, a first release paperback copy of the book, an opportunity to have your ancestor's recipe featured in the book or an opportunity to have a picture of your ancestor on the front cover.

(Payment is made through PayPal, but you do not need to have a PayPal account to contribute.  Once you click on the payment button, you will see the option to enter your credit card information if you do not have a PayPal account.)

The Impact

I am passionate about family history and food!  This project brings both of these together in a poignant and delicious way.  Within one book people will be able to read stories of those people who have lived before us and shaped our lives.  The book will also contain recipes that have been handed down through the generations that we can incorporate into our own families and hand down to future generations. 

Our Ancestors' Recipes will be a keepsake that can be treasured now and in the future by our children and grandchildren.  My hope is that this book will also inspire families to share their own stories with their children, so that their stories are not lost to future generations.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute money, I truly understand.  Or if you prefer to wait for the release of the book to buy it, I understand that as well!

It would be a HUGE help if you could forward this to people that you know.  You can do this through Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest or word of mouth!   You can use the Indiegogo share tools to make it easy!  The more people who know about Our Ancestors' Recipes the better this book will be! 

Thank you so much!

story:
Wow. Thank you EVERYONE who donated financially, shared the project via social media, helped with the live fundraisers, contributed with the marketing and/or sent happy juju my way.

While we didn't quite make our goal, it's a GREAT START and I can certainly work with this for now. If you still would like to contribute, please Paypal me at candice (at) theorgasmiclife (dot) com. And please mark it as a "gift" to avoid fees.

I am also planning more live events in San Francisco, so keep a look out for those. You can stay up-to-date by signing up on my mailing list at www.theorgasmiclife.com

Again, thank you for an incredible 5 weeks. I can't wait to share the book with you.

Blessings,

Candice

********************************************************************************************

“…reading the emotional storm through my silent expressions, he softly laughed and said, "This is how I always want to remember you. Hungry. Open. Vulnerable. Consumed by desire. I want every moment of your life to be this electric. This…alive.'”--Candice Holdorf

My story

My name is Candice Holdorf. I am a writer and teacher of sexuality and orgasm. I spent many years of my life in desperate fear of my sexuality. I used anorexia as a way to numb my hunger. I hid behind my ex-husband so I wouldn't have to confront my desire. 

Until the day came when I could not go on living as the walking dead. I made a "fear list" and did everything on that list because I wanted to know what was beyond my terror limit.

What I discovered was a woman learning to live in agreement with her own eroticism--which is not always easy given that we live in a society where female sexuality is reduced to an object to be won, bought, bartered or stolen. 

Thanks to my own practice of connecting to orgasm, as well as teaching others to connect to their own, I now have access to a deeper truth: that as a woman, it is my birthright to know my pleasure, speak my desire and celebrate my sexuality.

This book is more than just a project. It’s my prayer for the planet.

What is "From 6 to 9"?

"From 6 to 9 and Beyond: Widening the Lens of Feminine Eroticism" uses 6 fictional short stories, 9 poems and artisitc photography by Seqouia Emmanuelle to capture the erotic awakening of 6 feminine archetypes: The Virgin, The Whore, The Warrior, The Queen, The Nun, The Grand-Mother.

My mission to shift the way we view sexuality, from sex as commerce to sex as expression of deepest truth.

My book moves beyond the male-gaze pornographic and Harlequin romance novel perspectives of female sexuality and reintroduces the erotic back into sex.

The me, the erotic is a way of living that is infused with joy, wonder and reverence for this life. Every moment is an opportunity to tap into that dynamic, pulsing life force we call orgasm.

Here is a link to one of the stories, The Warrior: http://www.theorgasmiclife.com/2012/02/hunger-short-story.html

Here is a link to one of the poems: http://www.theorgasmiclife.com/2012/01/unexpressed-desire.html

Where will the money go?

The money for this project will go towards hiring a professional publiscist, photographer Seqouia Emmanuelle (http://sequoiaemmanuelle.com) and her team of hair, make-up and wardrobe stylists and purchasing the best self-publishing package possible. I am most interested in Balboa Press, a division of Hay House.

I will also donate 10% of book sale profits and any money I raise above $20,000 to All We Want Is Love, and orgasnization that ends sex trafficking http://www.allwewantislove.org

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially at this time, you can still join the movement! Share this campaign with your friends and post to social media.

I am also planning live events in the San Francisco area. Sign up on my mailing list at http://www.theorgasmiclife.com to stay up to date.

As you can see there are lots of ways to participate. If you feel as passionate as I do about healing our relationship to sexuality, we need your help! Your voice, your contributions, your willingness to be a part of this movement are the only way we can make sustainable change.

Professional Biography

As a coach, Candice is dedicated to helping people delve into the scary and taboo places in their lives so that they may discover the joy and freedom of The Orgasmic Life. Her style of coaching is boldly honest, yet compassionate and open-minded. She is a teacher of sexuality and orgasm, with a speciality in the practice of Orgasmic Meditation. She is a regular contributor to The Good Men Project and elephantjournal.com, as well as maintains her own blog, The Orgasmic Life.

http://www.theorgasmiclife.com

http://www.candiceholdorfcoaching.com 

Photo credit: Sequoia Emmanuelle

While we didn't quite make our goal, it's a GREAT START and I can certainly work with this for now. If you still would like to contribute, please Paypal me at candice (at) theorgasmiclife (dot) com. And please mark it as a "gift" to avoid fees.
I am also planning more live events in San Francisco, so keep a look out for those. You can stay up-to-date by signing up on my mailing list at www.theorgasmiclife.com
Again, thank you for an incredible 5 weeks. I can't wait to share the book with you.
Blessings,
Candice

story:
En Calle

El proyecto documental animado sin fines de lucro "En Calle" busca generar conciencia sobre los problemas y situaciones que día con día enfrenta la gente en situación o riesgo de calle. Nuestro objetivo principal es lograr generar reflexión acerca de uno de los problemas más complejos de México mediante historias y vidas reales. Aunque todas las historias son contadas por niños o adultos en situación o riesgo de calle, en este proyecto nos apoyamos en la animación para eliminar prejuicios sociales y obtener la atención de la gente en el fondo del problema, escuchando de primera voz el testimonio.

Buscamos generar un cambio social desde lo más profundo de nuestras comunidades y esperamos que logremos generar esto empezando por ti.

Lo que ya se tiene y lo que necesitamos

El proyecto de "En Calle" consta de las historias recolectadas a través de entrevistas realizadas a niños y adultos que viven en situación de calle en la ciudad de México. Todas las entrevistas han sido realizadas y editadas de manera cuidadosa para contar lo que a los entrevistados les parece más importante de su situación y su día a día. Una muestra de las primeras dos entrevistas y ediciones realizadas por nosotros son los primeros dos cortos que han sido publicados en youtube o vimeo. En este momento se tienen otras 8 pistas de audio listas para ser convertidas a guión cinematográfico y animadas con más historias restantes de Aldair y Blanquita, así como algunos niños y jóvenes más. Incluso los personajes ya han sido creados y se encuentran listos para ser animados en el momento que se obtengan los fondos.

Lo que hace falta en este momento para poder dar a conocer las historias de los demás entrevistados es el dinero para pagar a los animadores y/o postproductores por su tiempo, generar storyboards y obtener los equipos y software necesarios para crear y finalizar la animación 3D. Esencialmente, los fondos recaudados para esta causa se utilizarán para rentar el equipo y software requerido para terminar la serie y los otros ocho episodios restantes utilizando la misma técnica de animación 3D, así como para pagar el tiempo humano que se requiere. Nuestra finalidad es producirlo, no venderlo, así que todos los episodios terminados se distribuirán por internet bajo una licencia de Creative Commons, y quedan disponibles para que cualquiera pueda verlos y a su vez proyectarlos con nuestro permiso de manera gratuita, como ha ocurrido en ocasiones con los episodios ya producidos.

El dinero recaudado en esta campaña se utilizaría de la siguiente manera, de acuerdo a lo que se pueda obtener:

$1000 - equipo de cómputo

$2000 - equipo de cómputo, capítulos 3 y 4

$3000 - equipo de cómputo, capítulos 3, 4, 5, y 6

$4000 - equipo de cómputo, capítulos 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 y 8

$5000 - equipo de cómputo, capítulos 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 y 10

Para ver una lista de las temáticas de los episodios aún por producir, junto con los ya terminados, vista: http://encalleserie.wordpress.com/episodios/

Impacto 

Creemos que el impacto que puede tener esta serie a mediano y largo plazo no es sólo generar conciencia acerca de un problema que a todos nos incumbe pero también lograr poco a poco que la comunidad se involucre con su entorno. Que la comunidad entienda que todos somos parte de la misma sociedad, que mientras las mismas condiciones y tratos no sean ofrecidas a todas las personas, y que mientras no exijamos para todos lo que exigimos para nosotros mismos no podremos salir adelante como país y como sociedad. 

Esperamos que esta serie muestre a mucha gente en México y en el mundo una realidad que se oculta todo el tiempo y por lo mismo no es atendida ni por los gobiernos ni por la misma sociedad. El primer punto de nuestro plan es generar esa opinión pública mediante la reflexión individual, que se traduzca en una conciencia del problema, y después generar programas utilizando otras instituciones para ayudar y apoyar iniciativas basándonos en la gente, instituciones o gobiernos que estén dispuestas a buscar una solución integral a esta situación que enfrenta un gran número de personas (niños y adultos).   

Otras maneras en las que puedes ayudar

Si no puedes o no estas interesado en donar para esta serie pero te interesa ayudar de otras maneras, existen muchas instituciones en México que llevan muchos años tratando de ayudar a la gente en situación de calle y la gran mayoría necesitan voluntarios. Las principales instituciones que fueron identificadas durante este proyecto son:

-        Fundación Juconi (Puebla)

-        Fundación Ednica (D.F. sur – Cerca del metro C.U.)

-        El Caracol AC (D.F. oriente - Zaragoza)

-        Casa Alianza  (D.F.)

Sobre los autores (via linkedin)

David Llorens - Productor

Carlos Azcuaga - Director

story:
ATTENTION: If you have heard about "50 Shades of Grey" then Congratulations on finding this new book!

ABOUT US & OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN:

We are raising funds to finish production of our new book, “Get Fit For Your 50 SHADES OF ADVENTURE,” by Shonda Lewis and Tony Reynolds.

Shonda Lewis was an overweight single woman who decided one day she needed to change. After she began working on getting herself back into shape she regained her confidence and her self-esteem. She grew so confident, she decided to compete at the Arnold Sports Festival, which is the largest multi-sport event in the world, which now boasts more than 18,000 competitors over a four day event and 250,000 attendees. She won in 2009, and decided to make fitness an integral part of her life.

Noticing an opportunity, Shonda created a way for other women to compete in a Bikini contest online. Rock Star Bikini was born and the Arnold Sports Festival was so excited about this new contest, they chose to partner with Shonda, in the newly, Arnold Sports Festival’s Rock Star Bikini contest. (http://www.rockstarbikini.com).

Now Shonda see another opportunity to help women, those  who want to get fit like her. She has decided to create this book, and give women a fun way to get into shape and keep entertained.

THE PROJECT: 

NEW SPECIAL COLLECTORS LIMITED EDITION BOOK

"GET FIT FOR YOUR 50 SHADES OF ADVENTURE"

(The IndieGoGo Edition will not be sold to the general public, you can only get it here. )

To support us, click " Contribute Now" on the right, or click directly on any of the available rewards on the right.

 

 

"Yours is the ONLY fitness book that I'll actually need!"

This is what we are already hearing from our fans!

Our Goal: We want to raise enough funds to finish production, which means the money we raise will go for professional publishing services such as professional editing services, in some cases hard cover binding. And it will be used for professional public relations and marketing to promote the book including press releases, ordering promotional copies, travel expenses for talk show interviews in NYC and Los Angeles, etc. We’ll also need to pay for any legal fees, or licensing for pictures etc. If we raise more than we wanted, we will use that to create a special/special edition.

How you can be involved: Any amount  you can contribute is much appreciated and will definitely help us reach our goal, and therefore we will make it worth your while. We offer a lot of perks such as a chance to have your name in the book, a Valentines day Perk, with a Chat with the authors and you get your name in the book, or to even be featured in the book with your pictures and everything.

Thank you in advance for your support. Even if you cannot support us financially at this time, you can help by spreading the word about the project to make it possible.

TELL ME MORE ABOUT THE BOOK

"Get Fit For Your 50 Shades of Adventure" is your guide to having the 50 Shades of Grey experience in the privacy of your own home.  After you read this, you will surely agree that your participation in this offering will at least be fun!

This new book is written by fitness guru Shonda Lewis and Tony Reynolds:

  • "50 Shades of Grey" is a #1 Best Seller by E.L. James that has sold more than 65 million copies worldwide!
  • Shonda Lewis has matched exercises to some of the themes in the book for you, so you can actually accomplish some of the bends, twists and turns without injuring yourself and increase your endurance.
  • She shares SECRETS and TIPS to guide you.
  • When you try these exercises in the privacy of your own home, you will get the benefit of feeling like you are "IN the book!"
  • No Partner necessary, these can be done by yourself!

What makes this book AMAZING!?

Because of a few things:

  • You can actually feel the same tension in your own home by yourself with these exercises. "Yes feel the BURN"
  • Book packed with tips like 5 Amazing Foods Guaranteed to make you lose weight and feel sexy!

  • By giving at least $125, you can actually have your name included in the book, and show to your friends. How awesome is that?

The finished product will be a Special Collectors Limited Edition 9"x12", 200+ page, cloth-bound, hardcover, professionally printed book in full color on thick, #100 paper stock. We will be printing limited copies of the book.

REMEMBER: THIS VERSION WILL NEVER BE SOLD PUBLICLY!

TELL ME MORE ABOUT YOU BOTH!

Shonda Lewis is a Fitness professional, having won the Arnold Sports Festival Amateur Fitness division, Lewis went on to found the Rock Star Bikini contest RockStarBikini.Com, a nationwide online contest that culminates with a winner being chosen at the Arnold Sports Festival. Shonda has partnered with the Arnold Sports Festival to make this an exciting event.

The first two winners of her annual event have gone on to win the Arnold Sports Festival Overall divisions and become professional's in the sport. Shonda has proven she has an eye for fitness talent.

Shonda has been recently (February 5th 2013) featured in an episode on BRAVO's Millionaire Matchmaker television series. She has been on the TYRA banks show, ManCow Mueller's national radio show, Essence Magazine online, and hundreds of other interviews and broadcasts.

Tony Reynolds has written two books and he and his work have appeared in: Oprah.Com, FoxNews.Com, Associated Press, ESPN, FoxSports, FoxSoccer, CBS Early Show, Vanity Fair and hundreds of other media. (see sample screenshots below)

You can trust Lewis and Reynolds have the experience in fitness and the media to get this book completed.

USE OF FUNDS:

WHY $20,000?

Because that is the minimum we need to get this completed.

  • Professional Publishing Services
  • Professional Editing Services
  • Legal for copyrights, etc.
  • Hardcover Binding
  • Public Relations
  • Marketing
  • Promotional Copies
  • Travel Expense for talk show interviews

WHAT HAPPENS AT $80,000?

Our ultimate goal is $80,000 to complete a full run of the Hardcover Limited Edition copy of the book.

Thank you in advance for your support. Even if you cannot support us financially at this time, you can help by spreading the word about the project to make it possible.

REWARDS

MOST REWARDS INCLUDE FREE SHIPPING in the U.S.
We are offering Limited Edition Collectors items including Mugs, Messenger Bags, T-Shirts, Hard Cover copies of the books and much more!

NOW YOU CAN BE A PART OF THE NEW SPECIAL COLLECTORS LIMITED EDITION!

Don't miss your chance to be included in this updated book, certain to hit the New York Times Best Seller list!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

FROM THE DESK OF TONY REYNOLDS

I have to say I am really excited and confident this project will be completed. The main challenge will be producing the best book and rewards we can on time.

This should not be too hard because Shonda is an experienced fitness person, who co-founded the Arnold Sports Festival's Rock Star Bikini Contest. She won at the Arnold Sports Festival, and then grew to develop her own contest. She has already two Overall winners under her belt. Both of those winners turned professional after winning at the Arnold Sports Festival.

She understands women and their fitness needs and how to get the most out of a workout.

She has appeared on BRAVO's Millionaire Matchmaker, TYRA Banks, Essence Magazine online, and other media.

I have published two prior books that have both received critical acclaim and my work has been featured on USA Today, Oprah.Com, FoxNews.Com, CNN, Jay Leno, Conan, CBS Early Show, ESPN, FoxSports, Vanity Fair, New Yorker Magazine, and hundreds of other media outlets.

We plan to communicate with you regularly to let you know how we are moving forward with this exciting project.

I know with your involvement now, we can get this book, and your rewards delivered into your hands on time.

Shonda has partnered with the Arnold Sports Festival to make this an exciting event.
The first two winners of her annual event have gone on to win the Arnold Sports Festival Overall divisions and become professional's in the sport. Shonda has proven she has an eye for fitness talent.
Shonda has been recently (February 5th 2013) featured in an episode on BRAVO's Millionaire Matchmaker television series. She has been on the TYRA banks show, ManCow Mueller's national radio show, Essence Magazine online, and hundreds of other interviews and broadcasts.

Tony Reynolds has written two books and he and his work have appeared in: Oprah.Com, FoxNews.Com, Associated Press, ESPN, FoxSports, FoxSoccer, CBS Early Show, Vanity Fair and hundreds of other media. (see sample screenshots below)



You can trust Lewis and Reynolds have the experience in fitness and the media to get this book completed.
USE OF FUNDS:
WHY $20,000?
Because that is the minimum we need to get this completed.

Professional Publishing Services
Professional Editing Services
Legal for copyrights, etc.
Hardcover Binding
Public Relations
Marketing
Promotional Copies
Travel Expense for talk show interviews
WHAT HAPPENS AT $80,000?
Our ultimate goal is $80,000 to complete a full run of the Hardcover Limited Edition copy of the book.

REWARDS
MOST REWARDS INCLUDE FREE SHIPPING in the U.S.We are offering Limited Edition Collectors items including Mugs, Messenger Bags, T-Shirts, Hard Cover copies of the books and much more!
NOW YOU CAN BE A PART OF THE NEW SPECIAL COLLECTORS LIMITED EDITION!
Don't miss your chance to be included in this updated book, certain to hit the New York Times Best Seller list!

FROM THE DESK OF TONY REYNOLDS
I have to say I am really excited and confident this project will be completed. The main challenge will be producing the best book and rewards we can on time.

story:
Change

We live in a world where the only thing constant is change - where global and mobile is the norm and new technology is introduced every day. 

We all have a choice: we can either embrace change and recognize the amazing opportunities available or we can fight it.


Our opportunity

If you choose to embrace change and all that comes with it, you are granted an opportunity to reimagine what can be done in your workplace. Change is never an easy endeavor but with the end business goals and objectives in mind, you will be able to move forward with determination and succeed.

With your help

With your support and involvement, it is my intention to bring to fruition:

  • An insightful and timely book
  • An interactive and helpful ebook
  • An industry-first and easy-to-use app

...to help you reimagine what you can do for your organization.

I ask that you only give what you can but know that I am grateful for the support.

Note: Specifics of how your support will aid in the development of the book, ebook and app are noted below.


Risks and challenges

It is our every intention to be set in the beginning of 2014. If we are delayed in our efforts, we will absolutely keep you posted!

~ Jason


Support

Book and ebook support: Your support will go towards expenses related to: editing, proofreading, layout design, printing and marketing.

App support: In addition to the applicable expenses mentioned above, your support will go towards the development and customization of the app specifically created for CHROs, HR leaders and CIOs. 

Other: The creation of this book within a short timeframe would not be possible if it were not for my extended team and their assistance. Your support will also help cover team-related expenses.

story:
Look around. Everywhere you look is the written word. Gone to a movie recently? Someone wrote it. Laughed at a funny commercial on television? Someone wrote it. Been moved or entertained by a novel? Someone wrote it. Learned important information from an article? Been touched by a poem? Listened to a song lyric? Watched a news program? You get the idea. Our lives are touched every day by writers.


Blue Ridge Mountains Christian Writers Conference (BRMCWC) has been training writers in the disciplines of writing for over two decades. Over the years, thousands of writers have brought their dreams of publication to North Carolina to study under working writers, editors, agents, and other publishing professionals. Many of these students have gone on to successful writing careers (and even returned to teach).


The faculty includes some of the best novelists, nonfiction book authors, screenwriters, freelancers, authors of children’s books, devotions, articles, and much more. In addition to writing, conferees may choose to attend classes on marketing, public speaking, and other areas helpful to up-and-coming writers.


BRMCWC is a place where writers network with other writers, editors, and agents. Time and time again, we have seen lifetime friendships formed, and careers launched.


Our writers have entertained, but more often than not, have been the voice for countless causes and issues. We believe writers change the world.


Almost on a daily basis, we receive requests for scholarships. These requests come from students or those who have recently lost their jobs because of the uncertain economy. As director, I’m committed to providing the best conference in the country and helping as many writers as I can.


But I need your help. The talent out there is waiting for a chance to shine. Blue Ridge Mountains Christian Writers Conference needs Patrons of the Writing Arts; people like you who are willing to help new writers (of all ages) get their start.


Every dollar given in this campaign goes to our scholarship fund.


Will you help? Whatever you give will be greatly appreciated and, I believe, will improve the world through the written word.


Will you be a patron?


Alton Gansky

www.brmcwc.com

story:
My name is J.K. Dark; I am the Author of two published short story collections, and one novel. Writing has been a lifelong passion, and my published works have been the culminations of a dream come true.

My recently released novel Dark Harbors has met with amazing success for an Indie author. I have spent a great deal of time and resources to build a writing platform and my own publishing company, in order to get my work in the hands of the reader.

My readers have asked for a sequel to Dark Harbors and specifically the beloved character Jack Cross a modern day Pirate.

  In order to fulfill this calling, and properly fund the publishing, printing, artwork and promotion/ advertising of the sequels, I have been advised to seek crowd funding. You can help fund and create two additional novels to complete the trilogy. If not fully funded, I will proceed with the second book in the trilogy, and fund it personally as I have all previous publications. While nothing in life is easy, nor am I seeking an easy alternative to hard work, having the resources at hand to fund the various aspects and marketing of the books will be an amazing advantage.

 We fully realize nothing in life is free. Therefore we have designed various packages of Perks to engage you in the continuing adventures of Jack Cross the Rock & Roll Pirate.

These perks range from acknowledgement as a contributor, to becoming or naming a character in the forthcoming books. The perks range from $10.00 to $250..00 and a level everyone can feel comfortable with. For less than the price of a book shopping spree at a brick and mortar store, you can become part of the process.

We will keep you updated on Jacks adventures via Blog, and FaceBook.

 Other ways you can help: We realize you may not be able to contribute financially, but we encourage your involvement.

Help us get the word out, use the indiegogo share tools to encourage involvement.

 

All aboard!

story:
PULL:  Where Emerging Leaders Meet

PULL started out as a blog in 2010 that brought together a cast of journalists, bloggers and opinionated people who wanted to go back to the essence of good, old-fashioned reporting and news analysis while using the tools of social media available today.

In the past three years, we have grown to the point where we can not only have a thriving online presence, but also publish a monthly print publication.

Our mission at PULL is  to provide an intellectual and thought provoking media platform to inform, educate and entertain the general public as a whole with a special emphasis to those who are emerging leaders in business, education, the arts, politics, culture and philanthropy. 


Let's Support Each Other

  • The funding will allow us to publish this groundbreaking publication.
  • Our funding is grassroots, as our content and message is not controlled by a corporate entity.
  • Whatever we raise from this campaign will go to funding PULL.
  • Thanks to our supporters, we are able to offer excellent benefit packages for those who donate to the PULL Cause! 
  • Have an opportunity to advertise in a National publications for a SENSATIONAL price.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Tell your friends, family and colleagues about PULL!
  • Share this link of Facebook and Twitter.
  • Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/PULLMag and tell others to do the same.
  • Support "The Launch" PULL's Official Magazine Launch Party.  Click the link for details. http://pullmag-efbevent.eventbrite.com/

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
The project

After first 15 months trip in South America I wrote a book "On the South American Vibe" (printed in Slovak language as "Na juhoamerickej vlne" and half of it translated and available as ebook on website) I traveled almost 15 months again, from Slovakia through Bulgary, Turkey, Georgia, Armenia, Iran, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Afghanistan and take a flight to India and traveled more in Nepal and Bangladesh.

For this whole time my budget was 4200 euros, what is just half of money, what is only half of the price of printing of the book. My budget, daily schedule and also list of hikes with more than 1600 kilometres hiked in the mountains, mostly in Kyrgyzstan, Pamirs and Nepal are available online in Slovak language.

I would really like to bring people a book, where they can read about unique adventures, hospitality of locals and beauty of of the nature. Almost half of the time I stayed with locals via Couchsurfing (my personal profile) and several nights I stayed at peoples places, who just met me on the way. And other enourmous number of nights I stayed in the tent, in the wild nature. More readers = more future travelers = more happy people :).

Photogallery from this trip you can find on Picasa.

55 demo pages from book about Central Asia (Silken Wind)

55 demo pages from book about Indian subcontinent (Colorful world)

Official website in Slovak language

As everything I do on my own (writting, editing, graphics, layout) and with support from my friends (grammar check), my only costs are printing costs. Priting of 2 books (one about Central Asia with 152 pages and second about India, Nepal and Bangladesh with 256 pages). Priting costs are 7200 euros without tax (10%) and till 5.6.2013 I fundraised 1680 euros from sponsors in Slovakia. Slovak sponsors can donate also website Ludialudom.sk and also, depeding on situation, I have funding fromy my parents and grandparents. As a proof of the price I can send you a copy of the print from the publishing company. 

If PayPal or credit cards are not the way how you want to support, please contact me at: michal.knitl@gmail.com and I will write you my bank account.

In case of lower funds, I am willing to publish the books in smaller amount.

After publishing a book in Slovak language, I would like to prepare materials for interactive travel book in English language.

I would be glad for any support. Even if you can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean that you can’t help. You can share this campaign among your friends via email, on Facebook or other social media.

story:
The CT National Youth Poetry Slam Team began in 1998 when CT hosted the first-ever National High School Poetry Slam.  Teams came from NYC, Worcester, Washington DC, New Mexico (the Navajo Nation) and of course, CT.  It was a 2 day event, held at the Charter Oak Cultural Center in Hartford.  The following year, the CT team went to Albuquerque (along with 7 other teams, including San Francisco, Los Angeles and Chicago) for the 2nd Annual National High School Slam.  This festival has grown into a yearly happening known as Brave New Voices, with up to 50 teams and 5 days. 

Now called OneWord CT, we invite participation from around the state (rather than one major city, like most other teams).  Team members for 2013 include Sophie Dillon (New Haven), Coree DeShields (Norwich), Emily Falkowski (Manchester), Olive Kuhn (Middletown) and Evan Knoll (Middletown).

"Through writing, we remind ourselves that we are all architects. Through performance, we remind ourselves that we are all ants, in awe of these things we have made." ~ Sophie

We host youth poetry slams throughout the year and offer spoken word workshops and orientations for schools and youth organizations, providing an outlet and a stage for young writers and performers.

"Write as if your life depended on it!" ~ Elizabeth

“OneWord CT changes lives.  It helps create a supportive community, as well as literary and stage opportunities that were not available when I was a struggling teenager, trying to find my voice,” says Ms Thomas.  Ms Thomas, along with high school English teachers Lee Keylock, Newtown HS and Laura Maiocco, Sheehan HS in Wallingford, CT and Devin Samuels, a student at UConn serve this year as volunteer coaches/chaperones/organizers for the Connecticut team.

"Poetry is vital, because it allows one to tap that inner creativity he/she might never know they have." ~ Coree

Brave New Voices presents the youth of 21st century America in all their verve and diversity.  The festival focuses on arts education and performance, local program development, national movement organizing and the highlighting of a new generation of performing artists, audiences and literary opportunity. 

A different city hosts BNV each August and this year will be in Chicago.  Teams come from around the world and 2013 will include Guam, Bermuda, England and South Africa, in addition to most major US cities.  One of the largest youth poetry festivals in the world, BNV brings together more than 600 youth and 100 nonprofit organizers to build a broad-based national movement of youth spoken word, civic engagement and youth development programs.

"I love slam poetry.  It is freeing but intense, unstructured but challenging. At Brave New Voices, I hope to push my limits as a writer and performer and watch (and learn from) other young people do the same." ~ Olive

As adult volunteers, we wholeheartedly give of our time and energy throughout the year.  And now, we are asking for your help.  The money we raise will be used for the $1250 registration fee (covers our lodging, breakfast and entry into all events), our team transportation costs (airline tickets for 7) and hopefully a team celebratory meal while in Chicago.  Any money left over will be used for next year’s team.

In past years, members of the CT team have provided workshops and performances including:

-  The Graduate Institute’s Oral Traditions Conference (for new teachers)
-  CT IMPAC Young Writer’s Annual Fundraiser
- Sunken Garden Poetry Festival
-  Council for Children in Crisis - Humanitarian Award Event
-  World Scholar/Athlete Games
-  International Festival of Arts and Ideas
-  Oddfellows Playhouse, Middletown
-  Riverwood Poetry Festival

These programs build community, as well as helping promote literacy and the power of written and spoken word.  We are changing lives, writing as if our lives (and yours) depended on it!  More at www.upwordspoetry.com.

If you cannot help with a donation...

We understand budgets are tight, so if you cannot donate $$$, please help by sharing this campaign with others.  As well, if you know anyone who might be interested in hearing more about our program, please ask them to email Elizabeth Thomas at upwordspoetry@gmail.com.  And thanks!

story:
Short Summary

Hello my name is Jamie Morgan Brown. I was born and raised in Jersey City, New Jersey.  Over the last thirty five years, my background  has been in Film & Television Production.  Since my recovery from brain surgery in 2008, my life is now dedicated to educating the world, about health and wellness.

My campaign is about health and wellness through nutrition. It’s also about teaching a fundamental law ...” Your health is your responsibility”  

My campaign is critically important to me,  because people are dying much too soon, from diseases, that can be cured through nutrition. 

If we learn to make better food choices, we can live healthier lives.  Health is a God-given right for everybody! I believe information is key, because if we know better, then we’ll do better

What We Need & What You Get

 

If I dont reach my entire goal, then the funding will take me as far as publicity will afford me.  I have every indication that my book will attract a publisher.  I need to get units sold to attract and develop a relationship with the right publishing company, that see's the Global vision of my book.  I need your help to raise $46,800 to pay for a publicist for 12 months.  

We have perks even for the $1 donors, some will receive autographed copies of the book, autographed promotional cards, T-Shirts, VIP admission to book signings in your city and VIP access to the books Launch party in Atlanta, GA.  Please donate what you can so that we can educate people on eating healthy to cure any Dis-Ease.  Health First!

The Impact

The magnitude is colossal.  I realize that, even though the responses to my book have been overwhelmingly humbling, I know I can not do this important work alone. Having a Publicist is vital!!!  With the contributors help, my dream will become a reality. The contributors will act as a conduit, helping me to spread my book all over the world.

story:
Hello! As some of you may already know, my name is Alex Castille, and I’ve spent the last five years working in Early Childhood Education. In the last year or so, I started writing children’s and illustrating word books, releasing some of them on iBooks. People often ask if they can get physical copies of the books, but unfortunately I can’t afford the cost to get any of them put into production. But I’ve decided that I’m going to ask for help. Because I believe that this is something I'm good at and something that I can be successful with, so I’m ready to get out there and try to make it happen.

That’s where this campaign comes in. I am asking friends, family, or even strangers to help me fund this venture of my first run of physical books. It would be an awesome experience to finally have physical copies that I can donate to childcare centers and libraries around Portland, as well as have some available for people who would like to purchase a copy for their little one.

This book, Yuck Yucks and Yum Yums that I am trying to get printed is one that I think can be very beneficial to the toddlers who are in the midst of exploring the world through their mouths. I also feel that this book will be especially beneficial for teachers and little ones in childcare centers where they regularly use art materials that some kiddos find irresistible and must taste. I believe that Yuck Yucks and Yum Yums will be a useful tool for parents, teachers, or any caregiver with little ones.

The printing costs come to $700, the shipping costs come to $200, and a proof costs $50 (might have to get 2), bringing the total cost to $950-1000. These costs would cover the printing of a proof (2 if need be), 200 copies of Yuck Yucks and Yum Yums, as well as door-to-door shipping. 

I’ve created a few perks to give you some incentive to donate to this campaign, with each perk including the items in the previous tiers. It goes from a personalized Thank You letter (donation of $5) up to a personalized Thank You song (donation of $100). The middle tier perk (a donation of $20) will get you a copy of the book, stickers of images from the book, and the personalized Thank You letter. Be sure to check them all out and see what tickles your fancy!

If you are not able to donate, please know that I completely understand! I am often in that same boat. If you are able to share the link to the campaign with your network on social media, that is equally as appreciated! 

I want to thank everyone in advance from the bottom of my heart, your support is incredibly appreciated and never unnoticed! Thank you, thank you, thank you!

story:
Story of My Book

Mile Behind The Smile: This book revolves around the stories of people who have been able to find happiness through acts of selflessness, service, and ultimately, love, as well as the struggles they had to overcome to live life peacefully. We learn that this ability to become vulnerable and not hide parts of your life that have weighed you down is what leads us to live happily.

My name is Calvin Long and I am the author of Mile Behind The Smile. I wrote this book because I’ve learned how important it is to learn from the stories of others, but also our own. Every person you encounter is writing their own life story with a lesson to offer to you.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover where your happiness stems from in your life. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for learning from others in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you live life to the fullest, leaving what’s heavy behind and flourishing.

In this book, you'll learn from stories of individuals who have grown to live a happy, selfless life and overcame the obstacles that once stood in their way, learning lessons such as:

  • Letting go of a heavy past, not allowing past struggles or insecurities define who you are now
  • Taking risks for personal growth, having the strength to make decisions that lead to a happier life
  • How anyone can make an impact, every single one of us can change the world for at least one person through our words and actions

 

You will love this book if you are interested in learning from the stories of others, truly listening to their words and taking them to heart. If you may have suffered from self-doubt, insecurities, or even finding happiness in their lives, the stories in these chapters will offer you guidance and support to help discover the love around you.

Mile Behind the Smile is a non-fiction book that speaks to people looking to better their lives and embrace their own stories who are looking at the power behind their voice for the first time.

 

The Book - Mile Behind the Smile

The book is written as a collection of stories, with each chapter telling the story of an individual with their own personal story, their unique struggles, and a heartfelt lesson to offer to the reader.

The stories begin with themes relating to finding happiness internally, such as finding peace within ourselves. As each chapter leads to the next, it slowly transitions into discovering the happiness and love that exist within the things, and people around you. No two stories are the same, offering their own individual wisdom on life, happiness, and stories.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2019
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Calvin Long is an alum from John Carroll University, where he studied Marketing, Supply Chain Management, and Entrepreneurship. During those four years, he worked as a student librarian where he fell in love with books and how every single book offered it’s own unique perspective, just like human beings.

Through participating in religious retreats, immersion trips to Latin America and engaging in volunteer work around the Cleveland area, he learned the importance of helping other people and truly listening to their stories. However, this passion for helping others has been in his heart since childhood. From elementary school until his first year of college, he would spend the summer volunteering at a food and clothing drive in the basement of his church, connecting to those he encountered. While in high school, he earned the rank of Eagle Scout, instilling the importance of service in his life.

No matter where his life may lead him or the path that he takes, he will always have the same mission: Make an impact. He might not be able to change the entire world, but that doesn’t stop him from aspiring to change the world for one person, even in the smallest acts of kindness, such as listening or holding a door for a stranger.

He invites you to join his journey in learning from the stories of others, discovering the mile each speaker had to endure to achieve their smile and happiness. With each smile comes a heartbreak, each story comes a villain, so often played by ourselves. Through sharing our own personal story, full of struggles and triumphs, he hopes to inspire you to live life as your own authentic self, living happily and peacefully.

For more information, you can connect with Calvin at CLong0103@gmail.com or  CalvnLong3 on Instagram.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please be sure to tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts. 

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support! It truly means the world to me to have you in my life.

Much Love,
Calvin Long

story:
¿Qué?

La invasión de los hombres rata muesra, en clave de humor, la esencia de la naturaleza humana en toda su magnitud (de lo mejor a lo peor) partiendo de una premisa hilarante.

¿Quiénes son los hombres rata? ¿Quieren invadirnos física o psíquicamente? Ana y Juan se ven abocados a una lucha estrambótica y estratosférica contra unos enemigos tan sutiles como misteriosos; ¿cómo logran penetrar en la mente humana?, ¿pretenden destruir la Tierra? ¿Podrá un grupito de superhéroes, heterogéneo y primerizo pero lleno de ilusión y fragor, salvar el Planeta de no se sabe muy bien qué? La cordura y la locura se superponen entre escenas de teletransportaciones, invisibilidad, hilarante delirio y misticismo.

La invasión de los hombres rata resulta una historia tan cómica, audaz y disparatada como rebosante de fuerza interior y  trascendencia. Tras una vertiginosa sucesión de eventos propios de un cómic pop de ciencia-ficción, se va desgranando una radical reflexión sobre el principio sustentador y esencial de la naturaleza humana: la libertad primera y ultima para elegir entre ser o no ser;
ineludible fundamento de este impresionante relato .

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Santiago García Rey.

Diplomado en Magisterio y Licenciado en Filología Inglesa (USC), trabaja como profesor de Instituto, tarólogo y escritor, entre otras cosas. Ha publicado Planeta Serpiente (2007), Cabalgando en el viento o la ciencia-arte de la psicoterapia asistida con animales y naturaleza (2009) y Cabalgando en el viento II - Definiendo caminos en la psicoterapia asistida con animales y naturaleza. Su voz literaria es intensa y lírica, siempre en busca de espacios trascendentes o transpersonales.

En La invasión de los hombres rata, explora el tono humorístico para relatar una historia que llega a conmover y transformar la esencia misma del mundo material y enfrentar al ser humano con su realidad psíquica desnuda.

Santiago García Rey se ha propuesto hacernos pensar acerca de la naturaleza humana, desde el humor.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 800€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de La invasión de los hombres rata que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Santiago García Rey vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
We are Andrew Lindesay and Tamar Yoseloff, the publishers of Hercules Editions, an independent press specialising in books and projects that combine innovative poetry and textual work with contemporary and cutting-edge visual material.

Hercules is now in its sixth year. Our first publication, Formerly, was shortlisted for the 2012 Ted Hughes Award for New Work in Poetry. We followed the success of Formerly with Heart Archives, a poignant tribute to family and memorialisation by celebrated poet and translator, Sue Rose; and Ormonde, a personal record of immigration in the Windrush era by Next Generation Poet Hannah Lowe. In the last two years, we've published Silents, a stunning tribute to early cinema and its silent players by the award-winning writer Claire Crowther; and Hammersmith, a meditation on the place and the river that runs alongside it by the novelist, poet and critic Sean O'Brien. You can see the story so far here: http://www.herculeseditions.com/

We are honoured to be publishing this important and moving work which explores concepts of martyrdom from the views of two cultures: the Iranians who live with the aftermath of the Iran-Iraq War, and the Black British community who witness the deaths of so many young men. Please watch our film featuring the author talking about the genesis of the book, and her interest in its themes.

We are seeking the funding to produce the book and create some special events to coincide with publication. We are Andrew Lindesay and Tamar Yoseloff, the publishers of Hercules Editions, an independent press specialising in books and projects that combine innovative poetry and textual work with contemporary and cutting-edge visual material.
Hercules is now in its sixth year. Our first publication, Formerly, was shortlisted for the 2012 Ted Hughes Award for New Work in Poetry. We followed the success of Formerly with Heart Archives, a poignant tribute to family and memorialisation by celebrated poet and translator, Sue Rose; and Ormonde, a personal record of immigration in the Windrush era by Next Generation Poet Hannah Lowe. In the last two years, we've published Silents, a stunning tribute to early cinema and its silent players by the award-winning writer Claire Crowther; and Hammersmith, a meditation on the place and the river that runs alongside it by the novelist, poet and critic Sean O'Brien. You can see the story so far here: http://www.herculeseditions.com/
We are honoured to be publishing this important and moving work which explores concepts of martyrdom from the views of two cultures: the Iranians who live with the aftermath of the Iran-Iraq War, and the Black British community who witness the deaths of so many young men. In breve...

Evangelion Italian Fan nasce dalla più grande community italiana di Evangelion, evolvendosi da gruppo Facebook a forum e successivamente a sito internet specializzato. Nel tempo, il nostro duro lavoro ci ha portati ad essere invitati nelle più importanti fiere d'Italia, tra cui il Lucca Comics & Games 2015, dove abbiamo omaggiato il ventennale di Evangelion, riempiendo una sala con più di 500 persone. Nel 2016 realizziamo a Bologna un evento interamente dedicato ad Evangelion, al fianco della Associazione NipPop, con proiezioni, conferenze e mostre.  
Questa campagna porterà alla creazione della Associazione Culturale Evangelion Italian Fan, la prima associazione italiana di Evangelion. 
Perchè importante? Fondare una associazione ci permetterà di avvicinarci a tutti i fan di Evangelion in Italia, tramite eventi e appuntamenti.
